section.title: 获取总公里数
section.sql: select Kilometers from Car_Infomation where DriverAccount=@DriverAccount

section.title: 获取总公里数-车牌
section.sql: select Kilometers from Car_Infomation where LicenseID=@LicenseID

section.title: 更新总公里数
section.sql: update Car_Infomation set Kilometers=@Kilometers where DriverAccount=@DriverAccount

section.title: 获取车辆当前状态
section.sql: select CarStatue from Car_Infomation where LicenseID=@LicenseID

section.title: 带司机电话的车辆详情
section.sql: select c.Guid, c.LicenseID,d.DriverName,d.DriverAccount,d.CarTelephone from Car_infomation c join Driver_Information d on c.DriverAccount = d.DriverAccount where c.Guid=@Guid

section.title: 获取所有可用车辆和司机信息
section.sql: select c.signid, c.Guid, c.LicenseID,c.Sites,c.CarStatue,d.DriverName,d.DriverAccount,d.CarTelephone from Car_infomation c join Driver_Information d on c.DriverAccount = d.DriverAccount where c.CarStatue='空闲' or c.CarStatue='出车' order by c.signid asc

section.title: 获取所有车辆
section.sql: select * from Car_infomation

section.title: 获取所有未分配车辆
section.sql: select LicenseID from Car_infomation where CarStatue='未分配'

section.title: 获取所有可用车辆车牌
section.sql: select LicenseID from Car_infomation where CarStatue!='未分配' and CarStatue!='禁用'

section.title: 获取单个车辆
section.sql: select * from Car_infomation where Guid=@Guid

section.title: 修改车辆
section.sql: update Car_Infomation set LicenseID=@LicenseID , DriverAccount=@DriverAccount , Sites= @Sites , MOT=@MOT , Insurance=@Insurance , Kilometers=@Kilometers where Guid=@Guid

section.title: 增加车辆
section.sql: insert into Car_Infomation(Guid,LicenseID, Sites , MOT , Insurance , Kilometers , CarStatue) values(@Guid,@LicenseID, @Sites , @MOT , @Insurance , @Kilometers , @CarStatue)

section.title: 更新车辆状态--guid
section.sql: update Car_Infomation set CarStatue=@CarStatue where Guid=@Guid

section.title: 更新车辆状态--licenseid
section.sql: update Car_Infomation set CarStatue=@CarStatue where LicenseID=@LicenseID

section.title: 解除车辆与司机绑定
section.sql: update Car_Infomation set DriverAccount='',DriverName='',CarStatue='未分配' where LicenseID=@LicenseID

section.title: 车辆与司机绑定
section.sql: update Car_Infomation set DriverAccount=@DriverAccount,DriverName=@DriverName,CarStatue='空闲' where LicenseID=@LicenseID

section.title: 更新调度员控制的车的数量
section.sql: update CLDD_Set set SetValue=@SetValue where SetType='ControlCarNum'

section.title: 获取需要调度员控制的车的数量
section.sql: select SetValue from CLDD_Set where SetType='ControlCarNum'

section.title: 获取所有车辆状态为出行、维修、空闲的车辆的车牌
section.sql: select LicenseID from Car_infomation where carstatue='出车' or carstatue='维修'or carstatue='空闲'

section.title: 查询某车牌的车辆在某天的车辆状态
section.sql: select top 1 NewCarState,licenseID,changedatetime from StateChangeRecords where licenseID = @LicenseID and changedatetime < @ChangeDateTime and changedatetime >= (CONVERT(nvarchar(50), (select top 1 changedatetime from StateChangeRecords where licenseID=@LicenseID and changedatetime < @ChangeDateTime order by changedatetime desc), 23)) order by ( case when @ChangeDateTime=DATEADD(day,1,(CONVERT(nvarchar(50),(select top 1 changedatetime from StateChangeRecords where licenseID=@LicenseID and changedatetime < @ChangeDateTime order by changedatetime desc), 23))) and NewCarState='维修' then '1' when @ChangeDateTime=DATEADD(day,1,(CONVERT(nvarchar(50),(select top 1 changedatetime from StateChangeRecords where licenseID=@LicenseID and changedatetime < @ChangeDateTime order by changedatetime desc), 23))) and NewCarState='出车' then '2' when @ChangeDateTime=DATEADD(day,1,(CONVERT(nvarchar(50),(select top 1 changedatetime from StateChangeRecords where licenseID=@LicenseID and changedatetime < @ChangeDateTime order by changedatetime desc), 23))) and NewCarState='空闲' then '3' end) asc,changedatetime desc

section.title: 插入更改状态表记录
section.sql: insert into StateChangeRecords(Guid,LicenseID,NewCarState,ChangeDatetime) values(@Guid,@LicenseID,@NewCarState,@ChangeDatetime)

section.title: 查询当前维修列表
section.sql: select * from CLDD_Fixed_Car where statue='未开始' or statue='开始' order by StartTime asc

section.title: 取消维修
section.sql: update CLDD_Fixed_Car set statue='取消' where FixID=@FixID

section.title: 结束维修
section.sql: update CLDD_Fixed_Car set statue='已完成',EndTime=@EndTime where FixID=@FixID

section.title: 添加维修记录
section.sql: insert into CLDD_Fixed_Car(FixID,LicenseID,StartTime,EndTime,statue) values(@FixID,@LicenseID,@StartTime,@EndTime,@statue)

section.title: 查询某车某天是否有维修记录
section.sql: select * from CLDD_Fixed_Car where LicenseID=@LicenseID and (statue='未开始' or statue='开始') and ( StartTime<=@StartTime and EndTime >=@StartTime)

section.title: 修改维修时间
section.sql: update CLDD_Fixed_Car set StartTime=@StartTime,EndTime=@EndTime where FixID=@FixID

section.title: 根据车牌获取带司机电话的车辆详情
section.sql: select c.Guid, c.LicenseID,d.DriverName,d.DriverAccount,d.CarTelephone from Car_infomation c join Driver_Information d on c.DriverAccount = d.DriverAccount where c.LicenseID=@LicenseID
